III.ii.2.F.3.g
.
Associating Extracts With the Proper Veteran
Extracts contain the following information that ROs must compare against information in a Veteranâ€™s claims folder and/or corporate record to ensure they are associating extracts with the proper Veteran:
service number
rank
branch of service
age
race
years of service, and
facility where admitted.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F - Fire-Related Records, Supplementary or Substitute Records, and Records for Unique Situations
citation: Part III, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section F
